IsRightAlignedIfNumeric.@Core.Description: Values that consist purely of digits are considered right-aligned (i.e., filled with leading zeros) when it comes to ordering.
IsRightAlignedIfNumeric.@Core.LongDescription:
Applied to a property with `Type="Edm.String"` and `MaxLength="4"`, this means `"2" < "11" < "2A"`, because `"0002" < "0011" < "2A"`.
            This behavior affects e.g. the `$orderby` and `$filter=… le …` operations and corresponds to the ABAP conversion exit `ALPHA`.
